name: I Can Talk to Animals! And They Hate Me?!
name_original: I Can Talk to Animals! And They Hate Me?!
description:
Game Prompt:  For a video game I'd like to see the player be able to talk to animals but all the animals they talk to are just highly judgmental and bully the player. Idk where that'd be taken or what the goal is it'd just be one of those "play for fun" rather than "play for plot" type of games. -Lexy

Game made in ~1.5 hours, using Twine 2 (Chapbook format)

Minimalistic, short & sweet!
